Class AbstractQueryWorkspaceObject_mxJPO

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.update.user.workspace.AbstractWorkspaceObject_mxJPO

Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractVisualQueryWorkspaceObject_mxJPO, Query_mxJPO
abstract class AbstractQueryWorkspaceObject_mxJPO
extends AbstractWorkspaceObject_mxJPO

User specific class to store common information of a workspace object with query functionality.

AbstractQueryWorkspaceObject_mxJPO

Default constructor.

Parameters:
_user - related user for this workspace object
_mxAdminType - administration type of the query workspace object
Method Detail

parse

public void parse(String _url,
                  String _content)

Parses all common query workspace object specific URL values. This includes:

  • pattern for the name
  • pattern for the owner
  • pattern for the revision
  • pattern for the type
  • pattern for the vault
  • where clause

If an _url is included in IGNORED_URLS, this URL is ignored.

Overrides:
parse in class AbstractWorkspaceObject_mxJPO
Parameters:
_url - URL to parse
_content - content of the URL to parse
See Also:
IGNORED_URLS

write

public void write(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                  Appendable _out)
           throws IOException

Writes all common query workspace object specific values to the TCL update file _out. This includes:

  • pattern for the name
  • pattern for the owner
  • pattern for the revision
  • pattern for the type
  • pattern for the vault
  • where clause

Overrides:
write in class AbstractWorkspaceObject_mxJPO
Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_out - appendable instance to the TCL update file
Throws:
IOException - if the TCL update code could not written

writeTypeNameRevision

protected abstract void writeTypeNameRevision(Appendable _out,
                                              String _type,
                                              String _name,
                                              String _revision)
                                       throws IOException
Writes the pattern for the business type, name and revision to the TCL update file in _out.

Parameters:
_out - appendable instance to the TCL update file
_type - pattern type
_name - pattern name
_revision - pattern revision
Throws:
IOException - if the TCL update code could not written
